welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Lyndhurst, the charming city known for its beautiful parks and historic landmarks. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to explore all that this wonderful place has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving primarily international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving primarily domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require periodic reconnection.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including dining options, shopping, and rental car services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the private terminal at Linden Airport offers luxury lounges, concierge services, and private parking for your aircraft.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves Delta Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines and is the largest terminal at JFK, offering a wide range of amenities and services.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves JetBlue and offers a modern and spacious design with a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal serves international airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as a British Airways lounge.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves American Airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options, as well as an Admirals Club lounge.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is where all commercial flights are located.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Westchester County Apt Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
